description:
Conan and his friends have come to Yadori Village in Shizuoka to help unearth Tokugawa`s buried treasure. At night, Yasukatsu and Michiki are killed with marks left on their bodies as though they were attacked by the legendary monster Nue. Conan and Heiji arrive at the truth of the situation and decide to recreate the trick used by the culprit. At four in the morning, Heiji announces he`s discovered the true identity of the Nue and gathers everyone in front of the hotel. Later, the signpost begins burning, and the monster appears with an eerie cry. Conan and Heiji appear before the others and explain the identity of the monster and the murderer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Resolution Arc)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Kaiketsu Hen)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (3e partie : La résolution)
أسطورة كونان وهيجي عن وحش النو (الحل)
コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (解決編)
